issues.description: The method for adding an element to an array is named 'appendElement' in the template repository but 'addElementToArray' in the solution repository, referring to the same conceptual entity for array modification. This inconsistency could confuse students who start with the template code and then compare it to the solution, requiring them to mentally map these as the same functionality, thus creating an unnecessary cognitive barrier in understanding code evolution.
issues.suggested_fix: Standardize the method name across both repositories, for example, by renaming 'addElementToArray' in the solution repository to 'appendElement' to maintain consistency and reduce cognitive load for students mapping between template and solution code.
